string.name: parent
string.value: Monster Rumor Mill
No wonder ... according to him, Omega Sector may also be on the move to defeat the monster. He said I'll find out more about it by eavesdropping on General Maestro. That won't be easy...

No way... one of the #b#o8140000#s#k could be planning something insidious...I can't let them create havoc over innocent people here. This may not be what Maya wants to hear, but I'll have to kill the #b#o8140000#s#k. \n#t04000054# #b#c04000054##k/50
I didn't find the #b#o8140000##k with the necklace. I'm sure it's alive somewhere. I know this may sound odd, but I decided to believe that's true.
(This is bigger than we ever thought...) Hide behind the bushes and listen carefully.
(No way ... to #b#o8140000##k? That crazy scientist ... something must be done before chaos further ensues.)
(But that monster... well, is that a monster? Anyway, they all gathered up, and did ... the unthinkable ... and ...Ah, time's up already! I better get back to the headquarters.)
...! Hey, who's there! You scared me! What do you want from me?
Hmmm, so you were eavesdropping on me. I can't believe you know that much already... Based on what I see from you, you must have gone through your share of chaos's. Fine, I'll tell you the story.

Months ago, a scientist hired by Omega Sector broke the ultimate code of conduct. He gathered up a bunch of monsters, showed them a strange ray of light, and they transformed into a bunch of #b#o8140000#s#k.

Monsters are usually just that, monsters, but when a monster like #b#o8140000##k completely overwhelms even an army like ours, there's nothing we can do about it. There used to be a tame-looking Lioner too... but it was wearing a necklace, so there's no way to tell who raised it.
The 100 created #b#o8140000#s#k then escaped the lab and disappeared, along with that scientist.

Every since then, they've kept themselves on the down low, which forced me to gather up the troops and search for them while putting up a Code Red. So far, I haven't heard any good news come out of this. That's it. Now you see why I was talking to myself?

That's why... I have something to ask from you. If you can, can you please eliminate #b50 #o8140000#s#k? I know finding 100 is near impossible. 50 is fine. Can you do that for us? We'll reward you well for your effort.
You're saying that monster with the necklace may have something to do with the monster in El Nath?

Thank you. Please defeat #b50 #o8140000#s#k that have stepped over the boundaries of the wolves. I want to see for it myself that you killed them all, so please bring me #b50 #t04000054#s#k as proof. Good luck.
#b#o8140000#s#k have to be taken care of and killed before they cause any more harm on the innocent citizens of El Nath! Please reconsider!
Have you defeated the #b#o8140000#s#k?

Yes, they are #b#t4000054##k. Great job. Thanks to your help, the Earth remains a safe place to live. As the representative of the Omega Sector, I'd like to say, thank you. This is the reward I promised you. Please take it.
I don't think you have enough. That's #b50 #t04000054#s#k. Thanks.
